scripts.be-processing-start: DB_POSTGIS_HOST='localhost' DB_STATS_HOST='http://localhost' node -r dotenv/config be-processing.js dotenv_config_path=../env/.env
scripts.be-processing-docker: DB_POSTGIS_HOST='db-postgis' DB_STATS_HOST='http://db-stats' node -r dotenv/config be-processing.js dotenv_config_path=.env
scripts.be-api-start: API_KEY=false DB_POSTGIS_HOST='localhost' DB_STATS_HOST='http://localhost' node -r dotenv/config be-api.js dotenv_config_path=../env/.env
scripts.be-api-docker: API_KEY=true DB_POSTGIS_HOST='db-postgis' DB_STATS_HOST='http://db-stats' node -r dotenv/config be-api.js dotenv_config_path=.env
